Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndipo pamene iye adamva zokamba zawo, adawatumizira uthenga owaitana ndi kuwakonzera chakudya ndipo kwa aliyense, adamupatsa mpeni wodyera. Ndipo adati kwa Yosefe, “Tulukira kumene kuli iwo.” Ndipo pamene iwo adamuona iye, onse adamulemekeza ndipo adadzicheka manja awo. Ndipo iwo adati, “Mulungu ayeretsedwe! Uyu si munthu ayi koma mngelo wolemekezeka.”

Mkazi uja adati, “Uyu ndiye mnyamata uja amene nonsenu munali kundidzudzula naye. Ndithudi ine ndidamunyenga koma iye adakanitsitsa. Tsopano ngati iye sachita zimene ndikumulamulira, ndithudi, adzaponyedwa ku ndende ndipo adzakhala mmodziwaanthuonyozedwa.”
Yosefe adati,“ohAmbuye wanga! Ndende ndi yabwino kwa ine kuposa zimene akundiitanira. Ngati inu simunditchinjiriza kuchiwembu chawo ine ndidzapendekera kwa iwo ndikukhala mmodzi wa anthu osadziwa.”
Motero Ambuye wake adamva pempho lake ndipo adam’phwetsera chiwembu chawo pa iye. Ndithudi Iye amamva zonse ndipo amadziwa chilichonse
Ndipo zidaonekera kwa iwo, atatha kuona zizindikiro, kuti iye am’mange mwakanthawi kochepa

Ndipo anyamata awiri adalowa m’ndende pamodzi ndi iye. Mmodzi wa iwo adati, “Ndithudi ine ndalota ndili kutcheza vinyo” Ndipo wina adanena kuti, “Ine ndinalota nditanyamula pamutu panga mkate umene mbalame zimadya. Tiuze matanthauzo ake. Ndithudi ife tikukuona iwe kuti uli mmodzi wa anthu wochita zabwino.”

Yosefe adati, “Palibe chakudya chimene mumalandira, ngati chakudya chanu, chimene chidze kwa inu ine ndisanamasulire tanthauzo lake. Ichi ndicho chimene Ambuye wanga adandiphunzitsa. Ndithudi ine ndasiya chipembedzo cha anthu osakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndiponso m’moyo umene uli nkudza.”
